title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with a custom backend, product management, and a seamless user shopping experience. Built with a focus on performance and scalability.

title: Data Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing complex data sets. Features real-time updates and a variety of chart types to provide insightful analytics.

title: Automation Service
description: A service that automates repetitive tasks using Make/Zapier, integrating with various third-party APIs to streamline workflows and improve efficiency.

title: CV AI Chatbot
description: An intelligent, conversational AI chatbot built to answer questions about my professional experience, skills, and projects from my CV.
